title: Powerbook g4 superdrive
content:
Can the powerbook g4 superdrive burn data dvd's?   
I know it can burn regular dvds.   
thanks, the apple website regarding the superdrive mentions everything it can do except burn data dvd's . I just want to make sure before buying.   
Thanks alot.
author: david_leonard
